item.title: Forcats Weather
item.description: knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE) #Please load all the required packages library(owmr) ## owmr 0.8.1 ## another crazy way to talk to OpenWeatherMap's API ## Documentation: type ?owmr or https://crazycapivara.github.io/owmr/ ## Issues, notes and bleeding edge: https://github.com/crazycapivara/owmr/ ## ## It is recommended that you store your api key in an environment variable called OWM_API_KEY. library(knitr) library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages --------------------------------------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.2.1 -- ## v ggplot2 3.2.1 v purrr 0.3.2 ## v tibble 2.
